text:
Is there anything that has changed in julia 1.5.4 about loading binaries? I'm suddenly getting this error on github-actions:
```libGL error: MESA-LOADER: failed to open swrast (search paths /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/dri:\$${ORIGIN}/dri:/usr/lib/dri)
libGL error: failed to load driver: swrast```
Nightly works fine

elements.text: Is there anything that has changed in julia 1.5.4 about loading binaries? I'm suddenly getting this error on github-actions:

libGL error: MESA-LOADER: failed to open swrast (search paths /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/dri:\$${ORIGIN}/dri:/usr/lib/dri)
libGL error: failed to load driver: swrast

text: I actually thought, that `version: "1"` would be pretty stable and old so I was even more confused, but I just realised, that 1.5.4 only got released 5 days ago, which roughly coincides with the error starting to show up

elements.text: would be pretty stable and old so I was even more confused, but I just realised, that 1.5.4 only got released 5 days ago, which roughly coincides with the error starting to show up

text: Ok, what? 1.5.3 also doesn't work :smile: So what the hell changed? :smile:
And why does nightly magically continue working?

elements.text: And why does nightly magically continue working?

text:
Does the hash in here have any meaning?last working:
```Run julia-actions/setup-julia@v1
tar xf /home/runner/work/_temp/a4574112-5396-4ef6-8c1e-56ebe8d93b50 --strip-components=1 -C julia-x64-1.5.3-OHstCB
julia --version
julia version 1.5.3```
